about_the_game:
This is an atmospheric first-person game set in the 18th century. The game is filled with various puzzles that players must solve to progress through the storyline and unlock new locations. The puzzles vary in complexity and diversity.
In addition to puzzles, many notes can be found in the locations, revealing past events and helping to immerse players in the game's atmosphere. By collecting all the notes, the player will uncover the full story of what is happening.
The game emphasizes atmosphere and immersion, achieved through photorealistic environments, sound effects, and animations.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of violence, such as torture of people and dismembered body parts. Additionally, one of the puzzles involves the consumption of alcohol.

  • OS: Windows 10

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: Embark on a journey through the underground of an 18th-century abbey. As you explore the abbey, you'll encounter a series of puzzles that reveal its mysterious past. Unravel the secrets that led to the abbey's demise in this atmospheric adventure.
